reviewText: I ordered this set on April 12, 2012. I got it an hour ago. Imagine my annoyance to discover that Amazon sent me a Spanish language version. On the Amazon site, two versions(with identical covers), are listed. The one I ordered and the "Imported Latino Version", that I actually received. I'm frankly mad as hell. I will have to make a special trip to thepost-office or UPS store. Worse, other customers have also been burned on this. When is Amazon going to fix this listing?While I'm in a complaining mood, I'll also mention that the video quality is fairly poor. I suppose that this is a natural consequence of putting 780 minutes of video on just 4 DVD's. Soft focus and weak colors aside, it's still a great series. But, a set with an episode list I cannot even read, is not exceptable. Sorry Amazon, I think the world of your service generally, but you blew this one.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Lo muy bueno de esta version es que podemos verla aqui en Estados Unidos pero tambien en America del Sur, asi que muy probable compre otra copia para enviarla a mi familia en Uruguay.He leido criticas de que la imagen no es un "blu ray"!...bueno tampoco Carl Sagan lo vemos aca consultar su iphone, no, no lo hace. Es una produccion de los 70, y no soy un tecnico, pero no creo haya sido filmado originalmente con camaras de la talla de la produccion Star Wars.Quizas algun dia pueda hacerse una depuracion digital, pero aqui no veran eso.Si volveran a ver a nuestro querido pionero Carl, responsable del punta pie inicial de lo que es esto de poner el mundo de la ciencia en el living de casa. Si eres joven quizas no entiendas a lo que me refiero, pero cuando veiamos esta serie, no existia science channel o discovery channel, o cientos de series cientificas como existen hoy al alcance del control remoto, esto era unico!..el ver esto para muchos de nosotros fue un despertar intelectual.En cuanto a el español hablado aqui, no es el que yo recuerdo de muchachito, creo en mi pais llego con otro traductor,  quizas la version de España, a mi no me gusto esta voz, asi que prfiero verlo con la voz original, y en todo caso le pongo los subtitulos.Creo es un infaltable en tu coleccion de blu ray, Dvd, y si eres igual que yo, un material que no puede faltar en la lista de ..."visto"... de tus propios hijos.Otro detalle que me gusto, es que Carl Sagan habla en KM!...usa el sistema metrico decimal para hablar, increible que el ya lo hiciera en la decada de los 70, y hoy aun vemos series que obstinadamente siguen usando el Primitivo sistema Estadounidense de Millas, pies, y libras.PD. Disculpen la falta de acentos pero uso teclado en Ingles.PD. Venia a comprar otra copia para mi sobrino,...pero me subistes el precio!! : O

reviewText: I was a bit surprised when I put it in the player and Carl was speaking Spanish, but I found where to convert it to English and everything is just like I remember it from the 80's
summary: Seemed like it took a long time to get here, but arrived when promised
Title: N/A

reviewText: Yes folks, that's the inane question asked by the Amazon staff. How could the finest science series ever produced NOT meet and exceed expectations? And I'm quite certain there are billions and billions of people who would instantly agree with me. For anyone who has not yet watched and, in doing so, immerse themselves in the wonders of our marvelous universe, I heartily endorse this epic series and urge you to purchase a copy.
summary: Did Cosmos (Carl Sagan) Meet Your Expectations?
Title: N/A

reviewText: It was, once again, a true learning experience to view Carl Sagan explaining the origins of the universe, and our place in it. Having viewed the series many years ago, one can only marvel at how well this series has stood the test of time.It is the basis for the newest version now airing on broadcast TV, which is a tribute in its own right. Highly recommended for all science buffs, and inquiring minds both young and old alike.
Title: N/A
